name: @dnvr/transform
description: A library implements CSS Transforms in JavaScript.

scripts.build:clear: npx rimraf dist && npx rimraf build
scripts.build:construct:assembly: npx asc assembly/transform.ts -b build/transform.wasm -t build/transform.wat -d build/transform.d.ts --importMemory -O3z --converge --noAssert --runtime none
scripts.build:construct: npm run build:construct:assembly && npm run build:construct:module
scripts.build: npm run build:clear && npm run build:construct

author: Denver Dias
